title: Chicken Tortilla Soup
tagline: Smoky, spicy, with crispy tortilla strips
steps: Fry half the tortilla strips until crisp. Drain, season with salt.
Sauté onion 5 minutes. Add remaining tortilla strips, garlic, jalapeños, tomato paste. Cook 2 minutes.
Add chicken breasts, simmer until cooked, 15-20 minutes.
Remove chicken, shred, return to pot.
Stir in cilantro and lime juice.
Serve topped with fried tortillas, avocado, sour cream, cheese.
notes: Cooking tortillas in soup adds body and flavor.
Crispy strips must be added right before serving.
